author: norswap
content:
my issue with all this is that I was prototyping the scheme using SECP256K1 because I have no Java implementation of Bandersnatch, but the field order for SECP256K1 does not match that condition
I have other things to build before getting there, but I guess I'll have to implement the curve myself ‚Äî I'm not exactly sure how involved that is (or isn't)

author: 0xjepsen
content: this is a good paper on Lattice based cryptography which i am learning about. https://eprint.iacr.org/2015/938.pdf

author: 0xjepsen
content: Also a math professor at my university has written this very amazing C++ library for computing combinatorial objects. I have used it exhaustively generate irreducible polynomials in certain Galois Fields, but it also can used to for elliptic curve fields and many more abstract operations. https://github.com/abetten/orbiter
